body.name: VanAcc Sleeper Sofa, 110 inch Overisze - 2 in 1 Pull Out Bed, Sectional Sleeper Sofa with Double Storage Chaise for Living Room, Grey Linen Couch
features: 【Ultra Spacious Area】111" Enormous size allows you can stretch out comfortably, accommodates multiple family members or friends, offering utmost comfort whether for a cozy movie night or entertaining gatherings.

【Sturdy & Durable Pull Out Bed】Turn any room into a bedroom or guest room with bed couch easily and quickly with one smooth motion without squeaking Firm frame ensure the sleeper couch longer lifespan.
【Ample Storage Space】: Double built-in storage units integrated into the chaises, maximizing space utilization. Effortlessly organize cluttered items and maintain a tidy and appealing living area.
【Breathable Linen】Vanacc linen sofa sleeper is breathable and does not pill, ensuring a longer lifespan. Also has a soft touch, providing a comfortable and natural feeling.
【Assembly】 Take 2 people 1.5 hours to assemble, instruction and tool included.12-hour professional service team will support you if there is any problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for me!
reviews.reviewText: This sofa is one of my favorite pieces in my apartment currently. It’s the perfect size for my small apartment, and the storage is a plus; all pillows fit perfectly when made into a bed.I assembled this sofa all on my own (please note it’s advised to have 2 people assembling). It took me a whole day but was not hard to do (also note there are no words with the instructions, making it a bit challenging). It comes in 2 boxes; mine arrived a day apart. When assembling, I thought I was missing parts but soon realized the ‘missing’ parts were in a box labeled ‘missing parts’ lol.As for the L-shape, I wanted it to go on the right side instead of the left, as it’s supposed to be. I figured out a way to do so. On the side of the sofa where the arms are supposed to go, there are ‘hooks’ where you would normally place the arms. I decided to swap them in order to be able to change where the L-shape went.Regarding the comfortableness of the sofa, it’s very soft with fluffy pillows. If you plan to use it as a bed for guests or personal use, I would recommend getting a mattress pad to add a bit more comfort, as the divide of the cushions is a bit uncomfortable. The pull-out part is very easy (note that the only thing holding this part are 2 screws from coming out).It looks beautiful, though, and I would recommend it!”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not the best install, not the comfiest but very convenient
reviews.reviewText: This couch is super cool! I love the storage and the way it pops out. I think it is more comfortable than a lot of conventional pull out sofa beds and it is much easier to operate. It isn't luxury feeling by any means, the pillows should probably be replaced and its a bit on the firm side. It is not at all uncomfortable though. Putting it together was very clear but it was a lot of steps. It is an awesome sofa especially for small spaces and it is a pretty decent price for a sofa bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great couch for the price! AMAZING CUSTOMER SUPPORT
reviews.reviewText: Couch is pretty comfortable and very soft. It is the perfect couch for a dorm, bedroom or basement! The couch was very easy to assemble. It was missing a piece but their customer support was amazing! They were very responsive and sent out the replacement within 24hours of us reaching out!Highly recommend this couch if your budget is under $500!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: This couch arrived 3-5 days earlier than expected, which made me very happy! It’s a cheap couch, the fabric isn’t high end fabric, the wood base is very flimsy. But, for what you pay, it is worth it! Even though it’s not the most luxurious couch, it’s worth it for a small space and especially with kids! It looks very nice & the cushions are firm(which is good because the wood base would break if the cushions weren’t firm enough). The couch is comfortable, but do not expect a cloud like feel to it. It’s firm-comfortable.It took me about 4 hours to build, but I had kids wanting to play with the pieces so I was chasing them around the whole time. I’m sure you can cut that time in half if you do it without an kids around.Overall, I give the couch a 4 star because it’s perfect for what I needed and it came quickly& it’s good for what you pay.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected.
reviews.reviewText: For sleeping - It's more comfortable with a pillow topper on it, but don't use a queen topper, it's too big for it. I would suggest a full-size topper.It's small. My son is 11 years old, he's short, not sure his length, maybe 4'10" or so, but his feet hang off of the bed. If he sleeps diagonally or curled up, he fits a little better.The cushions were easy to fluff up. The couch was easy to assemble. The wood slats seem a bit cheap, and I'd say, take it EASY on the couch, because one aggressive approach on that couch, and you will snap the slats for sure.I basically got it for our game room/guest room area, so this couch is out of sight. Hopefully my guest(s) will be okay with the size & topper I put on it for more comfort. We shall see.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes in 2 shipments
reviews.reviewText: This came in two shipments. The seller was super fast to respond with the 2nd tracking number. The 2nd package arrived the next day. I love this couch. The pillows have been out for 3 days and they are getting more and more fluffy. At first the couch is not as comfy as expected but that’s because it was vacuumed sealed. Once you give it some time it becomes comfy. I would suggest getting the back pillows open as soon as you receive the packages so they have more time to fluff up before the couch is put together. The pull out bed is super easy to pull out but I found once it’s all put together it’s best to pull it by the front panel first, then use the pull tab to lift it. We have had it pulled out the whole time because we love to lounge. It fits me and my 2 kids very comfortably and we could easily fit another person and possibly a 5th. I love that my kids and I can all lay down at the same time and not be touching if we don’t want to. This is honestly my favorite purchase. My kids slept on it last night and they said it was comfy.As for putting this together, it took me an hour and a half by myself (29 yr old woman) and I was taking breaks to eat my dinner. If you have a drill attachment for this type of screw you could have it done in 30 minutes. It was incredibly easy to put together and the directions are very clear. I like how they zoomed in and showed exactly how to put it together. There was nothing confusing about the directions and nothing difficult to put together. Honestly I have no idea why some people struggled to put this together. The pictures were very clear. I took everything out and put them in piles of what I needed for what part of the couch I was building and unwrapped everything as I needed it because it’s all very clearly labeled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sofa bed
reviews.reviewText: Fabric is lovely, super comfortable to sleep on. Very easy to open into sofa. The two sides easily open for tons of storage, all the extra pillows and blankets fit. We had to hire someone to assemble it but even then it was less money than most sofas like this. It's great for a smaller space, not big and bulky but is about 8 feet long so great for a tall person to sleep on.
